extensionDescription.message: Zeigt einen QR-Code der aktuellen Seite an (PNG, kopieren & herunterladen).

actionTitle.description: Title for the browser action button

commandDescription.description: Description of the keyboard shortcut command

popupTitle.description: Title displayed in the popup header

uiCopyButton.description: Button label for copying QR code to clipboard

uiDownloadButton.description: Button label for downloading QR code

errorCopyFailed.message: QR-Code konnte nicht in die Zwischenablage kopiert werden
errorCopyFailed.description: Error message when clipboard copy fails

errorNoActiveTab.description: Error when unable to get the current tab

errorMissingUrl.description: Error when tab URL is not available

errorQRGeneration.description: Error when QR code generation fails

errorQRContainer.description: Error when QR display element is missing

errorSVGParsing.message: Generierte SVG konnte nicht analysiert werden

errorSVGDimensions.description: Error when SVG has invalid width/height

errorCanvasContext.description: Error when canvas context cannot be obtained

errorSVGConversion.description: Error when SVG to PNG conversion fails

errorPopupInit.description: General error message shown in popup

defaultPageTitle.description: Default filename prefix when page title is unavailable
